definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: little, insignificant, young;—abs.[[חָעִיר]] Ge 25:23 +; f. [[חְעִירָה]] Ge 19:31 +; [[חְעִרָה]] 1Sa 9:12; mpl. [[חְעִירִים]] Job 30:1; sf. [[חְעִירֶיהָ]] Je 48:4 Qr (Kt [[חעוריה]] but v.[[חׂעַר]]); [[חְעִירֵיהֶם]] Je 14:3 (Kt [[חעוריהם]]), etc.;—

definitions.title: 1.a.
definitions.body: little, with idea of insignificance Ju Jdg 6:15 (‖[[הַדַּל]]), cf. 1Sa 9:21 (‖[[קְטַנֵּי]]), Mic 5:1, Ps 68:28, Is 60:22 (opp. [[גוי עחום]]); of horn in vision Da 8:9, rd. prob.[[אחרת חעירה]] for [[אחת]] [[מִצְּעִירָה]] , cf. Bev Dr; [[חְעִירֵי הַצּׂאן]] Je 49:20, Je 50:45 (fig. of helpless captives).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: insignificant, mean, Ps 119:141 (‖[[נִבְזֶה]]), Je 14:3 (as subst.); on Je 48:4.v. [[חׂעַר]].

more oft. of age, young (usu. c. art. the younger, youngest, as subst.), of son (brother), opp. [[הַבְּכוֹר]] Ge 43:33, Ge 48:14 (both J), Jos 6:26, 1Ki 16:34, opp. [[רַב]] Ge 25:23 (J), cf. [[אני]] ´[[ח]] [[לְיׇמִים ואתם יְשִׁישִׁים]] Job 32:6; of daughter (sister), opp. [[הַבְּכִירָה]] Ge 19:31, Ge 19:34, Ge 19:35, Ge 19:38(J) Ge 29:26 (E);—here belongs also [[חְעַירִים מִמֶּנִּי לימים]] Job 30:1, si vera 1.; GHBWr Siegf Bu del. [[ממני לימים]]; LXX e)la(xistoi); put then under
